description:
The ergonomic and rugged Keb 52 backpack is designed for year-round use, featuring Fjällräven’s award-winning wooden frame and sustainable, long-lasting materials ideal for any terrain your adventures take you on. Its slim profile ensures freedom of movement, and well-organized compartments make gear management a breeze – including a front pocket that accommodates extra gear or layers. The carrying system efficiently distributes heavy loads and can be easily adjusted for varying back lengths, ensuring a comfortable and tailored fit.

  • Durable G-1000 HeavyDuty S fabric in recycled polyester and organic cotton
  • Waterproof Bergshell fabric for the base and sides, crafted from recycled nylon
  • Fjällräven’s innovative wooden frame reduces CO2 emissions by 90% over the standard aluminum frame
  • Comfortable and robust carrying system with an adjustable harness and sternum strap for a customized fit
  • Main compartment has two side access zippers, zippered bottom access and a zippered inside pocket
  • Detachable top lid with a zippered pocket
  • Supportive hipbelt offers a comfortable carry while pockets stash snacks and other small essentials
  • Dual side water bottles pockets
  • Attachment points for skis, ice axes, and poles, along with loops for toboggans
  • Hydration system compatible with hose port and routing strap (reservoir sold separately)
name: Fjallraven Keb 52 Backpack - Unisex
